channel.title: Cheeses Lazy work that he didn't finish

item.title: Cheeses Lazy work that he didn't finish
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“WhiteShadow, post:3, topic:6882”]Oy, I’m the master at that. I delete everything I didn’t get to finish.

My List

1.Karamja Lob Banker - Only got it to walk up to blue men
2.Edgeville Yew Cutter Banker - Got it to detect doors and chop tree and 2 walkpaths to trees, not switching it was suppose to be a payscript, compliant with my powerchopper. I don’t want to compete wilt solewn wishes though. xD
3.Catherby Lob Fisher - I lost it, I did finish.
4.AutoFighter - To lazy to test, fights, eats, switches players, buries bones.
5.PowerMiner - forgot
6. Alot others.

Come to think of it, it was sure wasteful…
A few I didn’t delete since it’s recent work.

Me isum not going to be finishing up stuff.[/quote]

What a ?waste? of time that was :S

Read full topic

Oy, I’m the master at that. I delete everything I didn’t get to finish.

My List

1.Karamja Lob Banker - Only got it to walk up to blue men
2.Edgeville Yew Cutter Banker - Got it to detect doors and chop tree and 2 walkpaths to trees, not switching it was suppose to be a payscript, compliant with my powerchopper. I don’t want to compete wilt solewn wishes though. xD
3.Catherby Lob Fisher - I lost it, I did finish.
4.AutoFighter - To lazy to test, fights, eats, switches players, buries bones.
5.PowerMiner - forgot
6. Alot others.

Come to think of it, it was sure wasteful…

Me isum not going to be finishing up stuff.

item.title: Cheeses Lazy work that he didn't finish
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Chuck Norris gets busy sometimes.

These aren’t all of them, I deleted a lot. I also lost a lot of my work when I got a new comp.

Cooks assistant assistant, not even closed to being finished:
[scar]{=========================================================================]
[ SRL Cooks Assistant. ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Cooks Assistant Assistant ]
[ WRITER : Cheesehunk ]
[ CATEGORY : Quester ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Completes the ‘Cooks Assistant’ Quest ]
[ USAGE : Place your characters inside the luby castle. ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ NOTES : Second real script ever made. First of its kind.]
[ CONTACT : cheesehunk@hotmail.com ]
[ CREDS+THANKS: Fakawi {Used some stuff from his BeerBuyer. ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[ This is a empty Template for a Collecting Script ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers. ]
[ 4. SET HOWMANYPLAYERS inside DeclarePlayers ]
[ 5. Start script Logged Out! ]
[=========================================================================}

program CooksAssistantAssistant;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var QuestColor, LadderColor, WaterSymbolColor,
Door, Door2,
Doors : integer;

//******************** Set These Constants if Needed *******************//

const StartPlayer = 0; // Determines who will play first.
CheeseDebug = True; // Do you want to know whats going on inside the script?=P
UseBenMouse = True; // Set to False if you fo not wish to use BenMouse.
MouseSpeeed = 20; // Set your MouseSpeed.
//RuneScape Constants*********//

//************************************************************************//
const VersionNumber = ‘0.01’; // Compliant with Rev 568+
//************************************************************************//

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=2; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

 Players[0].Name :='';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='Lumbridge';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

 Players[1].Name :='';
 Players[1].Pass :='';
 Players[1].Nick :='';
 Players[1].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[1].Skill:='';
 Players[1].Active:=True;
 
 writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players');

end;

//************************************************************************//

procedure PlayerStats;

var Active: string;
var i: Integer;
begin
writeln(‘’);
writeln('Name : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Name);
writeln('Number : '+ inttostr(CurrentPlayer));
writeln('Mining Level : '+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Level[15]));
writeln('Select Skill : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Skill);
writeln(‘Worked for : ‘+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Worked)+’ minutes.’);
writeln('Banked : ‘+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked) + ’ times.’);
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
writeln('Active : '+ Active);
writeln('Location : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].loc);
writeln('’);

for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers-1 do
begin
if Players[i].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
writeln( (inttostr(i))+’ : ‘+Players[i].name+ ’ = ‘+Active+’. - Lvl : ‘+inttostr(Players[i].Level[15])+
‘. - B :’+inttostr(Players[i].Banked)+’ Times.’+
’ - : ‘+IntToStr(Players[i].Worked)+’ mins.’+’ - Loc: ‘+Players[i].loc);
end
writeln(’**********************************************’);
end;

//************************************************************************//

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<============== -’+VersionNumber+’- Progress Report ===============>’);
SRLRandomsReport;
Writeln(’ ');
end;
PlayerStats;
end;
//************************************************************************//

procedure LoadStuff(Whichone : String);
begin
case Lowercase(Whichone) of
‘door’:
Door := BitmapFromString(6, 6, ‘z78DA75CD410E80300804C02F41’ +
‘050A4769FBFF2F494A4C30EA652EEC2E3298D025259AA89F3AD8C’ +
‘3DADAAA8AB5D68109D6DB6C75E5135626AB620CF7023B11980E19’ +
‘712DC68EC4AF9D4C7F93071BCE0BCB202EBE’);

'door2':
  Door2 := BitmapFromString(5, 6, 'z78DA3377317534B634C720CD8' +
   'C4D2C8C9CCDC9933537B13472C522EE68E26C6C002151C45D4CDC' +
   '8C8D904914BD06A686C626C8240052862816');

end;
end;
//Borrowed from Fakawi’s GoblinShceduler**//

Procedure OpenDoor(WhichDoor : String);
var XN, YN, LoadedDoor: Integer;
begin
LoadStuff(WhichDoor);
if (WhichDoor=‘door’) then LoadedDoor:=Door;
if (WhichDoor=‘door2’) then LoadedDoor:=Door2;
if FindBitMapToleranceIn(LoadedDoor, xn, yn, MSX1+50, MSY1+200, MSX2-200,MSY2-50, 20) then
begin
MMouse(xn, yn, 0, 0);
if IsUpTextMulti(‘Open’,‘pen D’,‘pen’) then
begin
if CheeseDebug then writeln(‘Opening Door…’);
Doors := Doors + 1;
Mouse(xn,yn,0,0,true);
end;
end;
FreeBitmap(LoadedDoor);
end;
//Stolen from DraynorColorFinder.scar*//

procedure GetLumbridgeRoadColor(RX1, RY1, RX2, RY2: Integer);
var C,TX,TY,DraynorRoad:integer;

begin
DraynorRoad := BitmapFromString(8, 8, ‘z78DA333333753575351’ +
‘B2507880400265E5801’);
while (C<65) do
begin
C:=C+5;
If FindBitMapToleranceIn(DraynorRoad,TX,TY,RX1,RY1,RX2,RY2,C) then
begin
RoadColor:=GetColor(TX,TY);
break;
end
end
if RoadColor = 0 then begin writeln(‘ERROR: RoadColor NOT Found’); TerminateScript; end;
if CheeseDebug then Writeln(‘RoadColor :=’+IntToStr(RoadColor));
FreeBitMap(DraynorRoad);
end;

//************************************************************************//

procedure GetLadderColor;
var C, TX, TY, Ladder : integer;
begin
Ladder := BitmapFromString(4, 4, ‘z78DA33B53036313030B33033’ +
‘3043214DC1E2B848E2D50300AFB11365’);
while (C<65) do
begin
C:=C+5;
If FindBitMapToleranceIn(Ladder,TX,TY,604,94,655,124,C) then
begin
LadderColor:=GetColor(TX,TY);
break;
end;
end;
if LadderColor = 0 then begin WriteLn(‘ERROR: LadderColor NOT found’); TerminateScript; end;
if CheeseDebug then Writeln(‘LadderColor :=’+IntToStr(LadderColor));
FreeBitmap(Ladder);
end;

//***********************************************************************//
procedure GetQuestSymbolColor;
var C: integer;
begin
C:=0;
SymbolAccuracy:=0.4;
repeat
C:=C+3;
wait(100);
QuestColor := GetSymbolColor(x,y,‘Quest’);
until (C>100) or (QuestColor<>0);
if CheeseDebug then Writeln(‘QuestColor :=’+IntToStr(QuestColor));
if (C>100) then
begin
Writeln(‘ERROR: Quest color could not be found, please restart script.’)
TerminateScript;
end;
SymbolAccuracy:=0.8;
end;

//************************************************************************//
procedure GetWaterSymbolColor;
var C: integer;
begin
C:=0;
SymbolAccuracy:=0.4;
repeat
C:=C+3;
wait(100);
WaterSymbolColor := GetSymbolColor(x,y,‘water’);
until (C>100) or (WaterSymbolColor<>0);
if CheeseDebug then Writeln(‘WaterSymbolColor :=’+IntToStr(WaterSymbolColor));
if (C>100) then
begin
Writeln(‘ERROR: WaterSymbolColor could not be found, please restart script.’)
TerminateScript;
end;
SymbolAccuracy:=0.8;
end;

//***********************************************************************//
procedure GetLumbridgeColors;
begin
GetLumbridgeRoadColor(622,31,652,62);
GetQuestSymbolColor;
GetLadderColor;
GetWaterSymbolColor;
end;

//Jacked from Fakawis BeerBuyer***//
Function InConversation: boolean; // checks for black separator line
begin
if ((not FindColor(x, y, 0, 21, 434, 21, 434)) and (not FindColor(x, y, 0, 475, 434, 475, 434))) then
Result:=True;
end;
//************************************************************************//
function FindCook:Boolean;
var a, b, C : integer;
begin
if(InConversation)then
begin
Result:=True;
Exit;
end;
a:=246;
b:=163;
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(a,b,6833734,10,10,500,330,3))or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(a,b,5653829,10,10,500,330,3))or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(a,b,4994098,10,10,500,330,3))then
begin
MMouse(a,b,0,0);
Wait(100+random(50));
C:=0;
if IsUpTextMulti(‘alk’,‘ook’,‘to C’) then
begin
Mouse(a,b,0,0,true);
Flag;
SleepAndMoveMouse(1000+random(1000));
end;
if(InConversation)then
begin
Result:=True;
Exit;
end;
end;
SendArrowSilentWait(1,100+random(300));
end;

//***********************************************************************//

function ClickNpcChatTextMulti(txt1, txt2, txt3 : String) : Boolean;
begin
if ClickNpcChatText(txt1) then begin Result:=True; Exit; end;
if ClickNpcChatText(txt2) then begin Result:=True; Exit; end;
if ClickNpcChatText(txt3) then begin Result:=True; Exit; end;
end;

//***********************************************************************//
Procedure SetUp;
begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
if (UseBenMouse) then BenMouse:=True
else BenMouse:=False;
MouseSpeed:=MouseSpeeed+random(2);
ActivateClient;
LoginPlayer;
RoadColor :=0;
WaterColor :=0;
QuestColor :=0;
GetLumbridgeColors;

 SetChat('hide',1);
 SetChat('off',2);
 SetChat('off',3);

end;

//************************************************************************//

Procedure RunAway;
begin
SetRun(true);
MouseFindFlag(648,35,1,-1);
FFlag(10);
BoredHuman;
MouseFindFlag(648,135,1,1);
FFlag(10);
case (Random(6)+1) of
1: TypeSend(‘ughh’);
2: TypeSend(’=P’);
3: TypeSend(‘lol’);
4: TypeSend(’****’);
5: TypeSend(‘stupid randoms’);
6: Wait(500+random(500));
end;
end;

//************************************************************************//
procedure FindRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then RunAway;
if Findname Then FindTalk;
end;
//************************************************************************//

Procedure WalkToWheatField;
var wx, wy : integer;
begin
MarkTime(Mark);
repeat
OpenDoor(‘door’);
if (not (Loggedin) or (TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000))then break;
if(FindColor(wx, wy, WaterSymbolColor,665,8,724,129)) then
begin
Mouse(wx,wy,5,5,true);
Flag;
end;
OpenDoor(‘door2’);
OpenDoor(‘door3’);
FindRandoms;
Until FindColor(x,y,LadderColor,650,39,701,72);
end;

//*************************************************************************//

Procedure WalkToLoc1;
begin
// Place Walking Procs here
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:=‘Loc1’;
end;

//************************************************************************//

procedure StartQuest;
begin
MarkTime(Mark);
if (not(LoggedIn)) then Exit;
repeat
if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>60000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
FindRandoms;
wait(10);
until(FindCook);

repeat
if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>90000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
ClickToContinue;
FindRandoms;
wait(100);
until ClickNpcChatTextMulti(‘look’,‘very’,‘happy’);

repeat
if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
ClickToContinue;
FindRandoms;
wait(100);
until ClickNpcChatTextMulti(‘wrong’,‘What’,‘s wrong?’);

repeat
if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>150000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
ClickToContinue;
FindRandoms;
wait(100);
until ClickNpcChatTextMulti(‘always happy’,‘help a cook’,‘distress’);

repeat
if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>180000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
ClickToContinue;
FindRandoms;
wait(100);
until ClickNpcChatTextMulti(‘Actually’,‘know where’,‘find this stuff’);
FindRandoms;
PerfectNorth;
end;

////
//
// Main EventLoop
//
////
begin
Setup;
repeat
if Players[CurrentPlayer].loc=‘Lumbridge’ then
begin

   WalkToWheatField;

end;
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc=‘Loc2’ then
begin
MarkTime(Mark);
repeat
if (not(Loggedin)) then break;
// Perform action until InventoryFull or 3 minutes past
FindRandoms;
// Respond;
until(InventoryFull) or(TimeFromMark(Mark)>1800000)
WalkToLoc1;
FindRandoms;
ProgressReport;
end;

if (not(Loggedin)) then NextPlayer(False);
until(False);
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: Cheeses Lazy work that he didn't finish
